definition: caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology
details:
adjective
- caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology
= synonyms: diseased
- caused by or evidencing a mentally disturbed condition
= example: caused by or evidencing a mentally disturbed condition
- of or relating to the practice of pathology
= example: of or relating to the practice of pathology
= synonyms: pathologic
